question: You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterintroduce yourselfdescribe your plans for the partyinvite your neighbour to come
text: I am your neighbour and we have recently purchased this house. We did not meet each other for an introduction. We are a family of 3 persons in total including my wife and a 2 years old son. We are planning for a party on Monday and you are invited.

Actually, my son's birthday is on upcoming Monday and he will turn to 2. On that precious ,occassion we have decided to through a party for relatives and friends. The event will be started at 7:00PM and will continue till 11:00PM. First there will be a get together following by dinner at 8:30PM. After dinner we have arranged a music concert. Although, the participants are limited I am afraid that noise will disturb you. I apologise for the inconvenience you will bear.
I want you and your family to be here on that particular day. It will be an honour for me. This will help us to understand each other as a neighbour.
I will be genuinely pleased if you accept my invitation.
